transportAdvice: Public buses connect the main towns during summer season with reduced service in the off-season. Biking is popular and bike rentals are widely available. A car is helpful for reaching more remote beaches, though summer traffic and limited parking can be frustrating. The island is reached by ferry.

weather.description: Cold winter with occasional snow and strong winds; most tourist businesses are closed.
Coldest month with harsh wind chill and quiet streets; a local's island experience.
Late winter transitions to early spring with gradually warming temperatures.
Spring arrives with cool, crisp days and the island beginning to come alive.
Pleasant spring weather as seasonal businesses open and the island prepares for summer.
Warm and sunny with the start of beach season and outdoor activities.
Peak summer with warm days, ocean breezes, and the busiest tourist season.
Warmest month with excellent beach conditions and lively town atmospheres.
Warm early autumn with fewer crowds and pleasant conditions; a favorite month for regulars.
Cool fall weather with beautiful foliage and a peaceful atmosphere as the season winds down.
Cooling rapidly as most seasonal businesses close; bring warm layers.
Cold winter returns with a cozy, quiet atmosphere and holiday festivities in main towns.
